body.name: Ameriwood Home Haven Retro Desk with Riser, White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 5 hrs 6 mins
features: Get a perfect work from home solution for smaller spaces with the Ameriwood Home Haven Retro Computer Desk with Riser
The crisp white finish coordinates with the powder-coated metal hairpin legs for a fun and unique look

The Desk is perfect for small spaces and offers a riser for extra storage for office supplies such as pens and pencils while the desktop offers plenty of work space for your laptop, notepad, and papers

The Retro Desk with Riser ships flat to your door and requires minimal assembly upon delivery. The Desk can hold up to 70 lbs. while the riser can hold 20 lbs. Assembled dimensions: 35.4”H X 44.7”W X 23.8”D
Coordinate your home office with the entire Haven collection (each sold separately)
body.description: Mix industrial and modern styles together to get the Ameriwood Home Haven Retro Desk with Riser. This Desk is perfect for smaller spaces with its small footprint and offers 2 levels of desk space with the added riser. The crisp white finish coordinates with almost any décor while the laminated particleboard desktop and powder-coated metal hairpin legs give this Desk a sturdy build along with a fun design. Use the Haven Desk in a home office or create an office space that works for you anywhere in your home. The desktop is large enough to hold your laptop, notebooks, and office essentials while the riser can be used to keep items close by but out of your way. The metal hairpin legs are a fun throwback to popular mid-century design. The Haven Retro Desk with Riser ships flat to your door and requires minimal assembly upon delivery. Two adults are recommended for proper assembly. Desk can hold up to 70 lbs. while the riser can hold 20 lbs. Once assembled, Desk measures to be 35.4”H X 44.7”W X 23.8”D.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Work From Home With a wide variety of desks, file storage, and bookcases, you are sure to find what you need easily and comfortably work from home!

L Desk Our spacious L-shaped desks give you the ability to place your desk in the corner or in the middle of your home office to define your workspace however you need. The large desktop provides plenty of space for your computer or laptop, printer, and projects so you can work from home with ease. Writing Desk Perfect for small spaces, our writing desks offer valuable workspace in a compact size. These desk are ideal for smaller apartments, dorm rooms, or bedroom home office spaces. Lift Top Desks Comfortably work from home with our convenient lift-top desks. Go from sitting to standing with ease so you are always able to work from a comfortable position. Our durable metal lift-top mechanisms allow you to simply adjust your desktop height and are sturdy enough to last for years! Desks with Storage No need to bring clutter into your home office! Our desks with storage offer shelves and/or drawers to keep your home office neat and organized so you can focus on work! L-Desk Writing Desk Lift-Top Desks Desks with Storage

Options Bookcases with Doors Whether you need a place to organize books and manuals or need more storage for extra office supplies, our bookcases with doors provide plenty of storage for home office essentials. The doors will keep your items dust free and offer an elegant upgrade to your home office. Open Shelf Bookcases Whether you need a place to organize books and manuals or need more storage for extra office supplies, our open shelf bookcases provide plenty of storage for home office essentials. Available in 3, 4, or 5 shelves, you will have all the space you need to have easy access to work from home essentials. File Cabinet Keep your important documents stored away and organized with our lateral file cabinets. The large drawers can hold both legal and letter size files, so you always have easy access to the paperwork you need. Use as a printer stand to free up desk space, perfect for smaller workspaces!

Dakota L Desk with Bookshelves Lawrence 4 Shelf Ladder Bookcase Core 2 Drawer File Cabinet Parsons Desk with Drawer Haven Retro Desk with Riser Available Colors Black Oak, White, Espresso, Gray, Rustic Oak Black Black, Espresso Black, White, Espresso and Many More! Walnut, Natural, Gray Oak, White, Espresso Assembled Dimensions 28.31”H x 51.34”W x 53.62”D 60”H x 20.5625”W x 18.5”D 24.4375"H x 15.5625"W x 14.75"D 30”H x 39”W x 19.7”D 35.4”H X 44.7”W X 23.8”D Assembly Required? ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Product for Price
reviews.reviewText: I searched for months to find a desk tall enough to fit over my radiator, and this desk was what I ended up with. I have very little experience with assembling/building, but was able to get this done in about 30 minutes. Very clear instructions, no parts were damaged. There ARE two people required for the final step, but only for about 30 seconds.Desk looks clean, chic, and modern. Lightweight enough to move, but sturdy enough to not tip. Feels substantial when you work on it, doesn't wobble. Plenty of space for laptop, various textbooks and notebooks spread out. The upper shelf is super handy and cute to set plants, photos, etc on. I was hesitant to drop this much money on a desk, but compared to Target, Ebay, Kohls, Etc....if you need a tall(er) and small(er) desk...this is a wonderful deal. Trust me. I searched for HOURS and settled on this.ONE con is that the surface scratches very easily. Having it on my floor during assembly, I got a 3in long, .5in wide scratch on the top of the desk. Scratch is white, desk is black. Still not sure how it happened. I have a smooth wood floor and the piece was unblemished upon arrival. Assembly was gentle. I guess everybody should assemble this thing on a blanket, or be super careful to not drag it over anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very functional and sharp looking desk
reviews.reviewText: This is a solid desk. Would definitely buy again!PROS:-The key reason I purchased this desk was the potential for posture. Ability to have screen and keyboards/mouse at different heights is crucial for me as i prefer ergonomic set ups.-Sturdy desk and construction. It also provides additional storage space while staying compact which I appreciated.-Looks great and seems like it will wear well. You can tell it's veneer at the edges but that's consistent with it's pricing. Great value for the price.CONs:-Minor detail - because tiers are offset, it's easy for things to fall off the back of the larger base surface area. Would be nice to have a back lip in line with the top shelf.-Minor detail - tricky assembly, i had to go rough from the order the instructions were written. I couldn't get the main desk to fit between the upper shelves' legs once they were already screwed in. Had to unscrew one leg, attach both ends of main desk then screw final upper leg on.-Minor detail - Several screws were stripping (3-4). Everything attached decently but if I had to break down and rebuild, it would be tough to get those out and would definitely need new screws to rebuild.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little mid-mod piece and fun to assemble too!
reviews.reviewText: - EXTREMELY WELL PACKAGED. I was fighting with the packaging for like ten minutes lol! The box is GLUED shut not taped, there's thick paperboard AND plastic corner protectors, Styrofoam all around the edges, every leg it tightly bagged and has a cardboard pad on the top, this is a VERY well-protected item. Absolutely pristine out of the package.- Tools are NOT included. You will need a Ph2 screwdriver and I highly recommend you get a shortish thinnish one because the hairpin legs make screwing a little, well, screwy. I only had average length 'drivers and had problems. A mini length screwdriver is your friend! You'll also need a larger Phillips and a rubber mallet. I recommend having a rubber mallet on hand just bc there are cam screws and I always like a rubber mallet for tapping those in all the way. Saves my fingers some pain.- Like with ANYTHING made of particle board covered by laminate, be CAREFUL and PATIENT with building this, and ONLY USE HAND-TOOLS and DO NOT OVER-TIGHTEN. I cannot stress this enough. Over-tightening is a terrible habit. You only need to tighten it enough to be flush, that's ALL. It does not take long but do set aside enough time to *take* your time, and read the instructions carefully. Arrogance ruins furniture.- There were only enough bits and bobs for exactly as many as you needed. Unforch this was bad because 1 of those screws looked like Muzzy had tried to eat it. Luckily I dug around and had a spare that had approximately the same size thread and was a suitably similar length, but be aware. Also the screws are a bit softish so don't use power tools. You shouldn't be using power tools to put this kind of thing together anyway.- The type of particle board is what I would call mid-grade--it's solid, not hollow, but the particles are a bit biggish. IKEA quality.- I got the espresso and the colour is gorgeous! I was worried it would look discernibly brown (I picked espresso bc it was the closest to black there was available--I really wish this straight-up came in black), but it looks very black, I like that. Like a cup of espresso, not ground beans.- The instructions tell you the weight capacity on the back of them! I think the shelf said 40kg and the desk is 70kg? something like that? I'll check tomorrow and edit this review.- The legs have a sort of speckly dark grey/grey finish which is cool with me. Adds a bit of visual interest that I actually rather like better than if they were just solid black, as I thought they were from the photos.- Speaking of the instructions, they're very clear and easy to understand.I knocked a star off because they should really tuck a little screwdriver in to help you with the screws that are on the acute-angle side of the hairpin legs, and because of that mangled screw; but I would buy this again and I would recommend it to my friends, family, and you! It's an excellent little piece, feels very sturdy, and has a phenomenal look for the price point it's at!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice desk
reviews.reviewText: Great size, classy, and high quality. Love it. I bought two !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly and great quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: We ordered 2 of these and I wasn’t expecting too much - but I am pleasantly surprised by the quality. We put them both together in less than 30 minutes and they’re solid. I don’t think I could have assembled them solo so it helps to have a 2nd pair of hands especially when adding the main level to the rear legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not last!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk last year (2022). It was the nicest and cheapest one I could find. I was able to put a lot of my stuff at the top shelf and use the bottom one for my laptop. However, 2 months ago I noticed this sticking substance on my desk. I initially thought my kids had put a candy or glue on my desk. I cleaned it up. It was no longer sticky, but still had this "watermark" look. A week later, the stickiness and gooie substance was back. It has gotten bigger now. I have no idea why it's happening, but I have a feeling I will have to throw the desk away before it messes with my things.

The media could not be loaded. Absolutely terrible quality. DO NOT PURCHASE!! It arrived late and then was missing the side panel piece. Once constructed it became clear that the wholes for the screws were on the wrong side of the board thereby negatively affecting the the integrity of the structure. I am demanding a full refund. I am not going to return it because it’s completely broken so I’m just throwing it out. ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE

I love this desk! Perfect for my little office nook in my living room! Study and well made! Also doesn’t look like a standard desk, so when I’m not working it is used as a console table!Good value for money all round!FYI - It did come with a few scratches on the surface which can be seen, but it didn’t bother me too much, as I was happy it fit exactly I wanted it to be go!

I've had a few desks but this one is top notch! It squeezes into the small spot perfectly.So easy to put together. I put it together alone and it only took about 40 mins.All together great product and company - the delivery was faster than expected and their product is solid!
Pretty easy to put together. Instructional videos on company website are quite helpful. Careful not to scratch the surface. “Sugar pine” is more like ikea Alex finish and not actual wood.
